## SDK\_SUBSCRIBE\_MODE\_EVENT\_TYPE variable

Event that subscribes a listener for modes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SDK_SUBSCRIBE_MODE_EVENT_TYPE = "WchSdk.mode.subscribe"
```
